upcoming.title: Winchester, MA Farmer's Market
upcoming.description: We will be at the community booth once a month with merchandise, activities, and information, dates TBD.

upcoming.title: Art Pen Pals Showcase 1
upcoming.description: Students from Winchester, MA and Imvepi Refugee Camp are paired through email and exchange conversation about culture and daily life, as well as art they create in response to shared prompts. Come see our work at the MIT Welcome Center!

upcoming.title: Art Pen Pals Showcase 2
upcoming.description: Students from Winchester, MA and Imvepi Refugee Camp are paired through email and exchange conversation about culture and daily life, as well as art they create in response to shared prompts. Come see our work at the Winchester Farmer's Market!

upcoming.title: Art Pen Pals Showcase 3
upcoming.description: Students from Winchester, MA and Imvepi Refugee Camp are paired through email and exchange conversation about culture and daily life, as well as art they create in response to shared prompts. Come see our work at the Griffin Museum of Photography!

upcoming.title: Art Pen Pals Showcase 4
upcoming.description: Students from Winchester, MA and Imvepi Refugee Camp are paired through email and exchange conversation about culture and daily life, as well as art they create in response to shared prompts. Come see our work at Winchester Open Studios!

past.title: World Refugee Day
past.description: Our team will be attending events in Uganda and spreading awareness about our library project.

past.title: Winchester, MA Town Day
past.description: We will have a booth with locally-made knitted items, tote bags, art activities, and more information about our project.
